recipes.name: Greek Yoghurt with Berries and Granola
steps: Spoon the Greek yoghurt into a bowl.
Add the mixed berries on top of the yoghurt.
Sprinkle the granola over the berries.
Serve immediately and enjoy.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Avocado Salad
steps: Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is cooking, slice the avocado and cherry tomatoes.
Wash and dry the mixed greens.
To assemble the salad, place the mixed greens on a plate, top with sliced avocado and cherry tomatoes.
Slice the grilled chicken breast and place on top of the salad.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon with Quinoa and Steamed Asparagus
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
Place the salmon fillets on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake the salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until cooked through.
While the salmon is baking, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Steam the asparagus in a steamer basket until tender.
Serve the baked salmon with cooked quinoa and steamed asparagus.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Mushrooms
steps: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them together.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Add the mushrooms to the pan and cook until they release their moisture and start to brown.
Add the spinach to the pan and cook until wilted.
Pour the whisked eggs over the spinach and mushrooms in the pan.
Scramble the eggs until they are cooked through.
Serve the scrambled eggs hot.

recipes.name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap with Carrot Sticks
steps: Slice the turkey breast into thin strips.
Cut the avocado in half and slice it into thin pieces.
Lay the whole wheat wrap flat on a surface.
Arrange the sliced turkey and avocado on one half of the wrap.
Add any desired toppings, such as lettuce or tomato.
Fold the wrap in half to enclose the filling.
Serve the wrap with carrot sticks on the side.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Roasted Vegetables and Brown Rice
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Toss the mixed vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet.
Roast the vegetables in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
While the vegetables are roasting, cook the brown rice according to package instructions.
Grill the chicken breast over medium-high heat for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve the grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables and brown rice.

recipes.name: Greek Yoghurt with Honey and Almonds
steps: Spoon the Greek yoghurt into a bowl.
Drizzle the honey over the yoghurt.
Sprinkle the almonds over the honey.
Serve immediately and enjoy.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Quinoa and Steamed Broccoli
steps: Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is cooking, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Steam the broccoli in a steamer basket until tender.
Serve the grilled chicken breast with cooked quinoa and steamed broccoli.

recipes.name: Baked Cod with Sweet Potato and Green Beans
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
Place the cod fillets on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake the cod in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until cooked through.
While the cod is baking, pierce the sweet potatoes with a fork several times and bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes, or until tender.
Steam the green beans in a steamer basket until tender.
Serve the baked cod with roasted sweet potato and steamed green beans.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast with Scrambled Eggs and Cherry Tomatoes
steps: Toast the whole wheat bread until lightly browned.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork until smooth.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toasted bread.
Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them together.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour the whisked eggs into the pan and scramble until cooked through.
Slice the cherry tomatoes in half.
Place the scrambled eggs on top of the avocado toast, followed by the cherry tomatoes.

recipes.name: Turkey and Cheese Salad with Whole Wheat Bread
steps: Slice the turkey breast into thin strips.
Wash and dry the mixed greens.
Cut the cherry tomatoes in half.
Assemble the salad by placing the mixed greens on a plate, followed by the sliced turkey and cherry tomatoes.
Serve the salad with whole wheat bread on the side.

recipes.name: Grilled Shrimp with Zucchini Noodles and Cherry Tomatoes
steps: Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Peel the zucchinis into long, thin noodles.
Brush the zucchini noodles with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the zucchini noodles for 2-3 minutes per side, or until tender.
While the zucchini is grilling, grill the shrimp for 2-3 minutes per side, or until pink and cooked through.
Cut the cherry tomatoes in half.
Serve the grilled shrimp with zucchini noodles and cherry tomatoes.

recipes.name: Greek Yoghurt with Banana and Honey
steps: Spoon the Greek yoghurt into a bowl.
Slice the banana into thin pieces.
Arrange the banana slices on top of the yoghurt.
Drizzle the honey over the banana.
Serve immediately and enjoy.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Breast with Quinoa and Steamed Asparagus
steps: Preheat a grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Grill the chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is cooking, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Steam the asparagus in a steamer basket until tender.
Serve the grilled chicken breast with cooked quinoa and steamed asparagus.

recipes.name: Baked Chicken Thighs with Roasted Carrots and Brown Rice
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
Place the chicken thighs on the prepared baking sheet.
Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until cooked through.
While the chicken is baking, toss the carrots with olive oil, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet.
Roast the carrots in the oven for 20-25 minutes, or until tender.
Cook the brown rice according to package instructions.
Serve the baked chicken thighs with roasted carrots and brown rice.
